title: @Riot pls respond!!! What will hextech chest give if I have all skins(except limited skin)
body: One of my friend have all skins except limited ones, and he keeps crafting hextech chests and these chests still give him skin shard. when he reroll 3 shards into a new skin, it still gives him permanent skins which he already own. Have you guys ever considered to give out limited skins in hextech chest for skin collect players??? Pls @Riot?????

replies.body:
Due to the nature of limited skins, they will not be added to Hextech Crafting.  Limited skins are intended to be, well, limited and only available to players who achieved something unique or were available for a specific event.  

I wish I had better news!  >.<
@.@......so in this case, do you guys have a plan for players who already have all unlitmited skins? I know you may have plans for champions (higher mastery level), but wat about skins?

Unfortunately, I do not know any specific plans about players who own all skins already when it comes to Hextech Crafting >.<  There is always a chance we may consider doing something in the future, so always keep an eye out!

Well I think the limited skins are complete crap for being unavailable to those that didn't achieve that "something". They should be given a chance to get them but no Riot's stupid policies forbid it.

> [{quoted}](name=SnugglePuggle94,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ll30yuV7,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-16T22:31:56.173+0000)
>
> Well I think the limited skins are complete crap for being unavailable to those that didn't achieve that "something". They should be given a chance to get them but no Riot's stupid policies forbid it.

They do give you a chance to get the limited skins. As the kind Rioter had said, if you are active at the time of the event, then you will be able to get the skin in some way, shape, or form. You had the chance to possibly be active for the event. Although make sure to be angered by Riot rewarding active members of their community, shame on them right?

Why should people that were there not feel like they are appreciated? 

Sure you joined too late to have something, but most limited skins go on sale again after a while. Some exclusive skins are just that, only for certain people. 

If you earned a victorious skin during a certain season it means something, if anyone can get it, it's just another normal skin that means nothing.

They should be given a chance to the victorious skin line but nooo they are only meant for Gold and above. What bullshit.

Sure they go on sale again but it takes forever until they actually do, and people have to wait months after it was first available to have a chance to get it again.

No, there should be no chance for it mate. You weren't there, you didn't earn the skin, why should people that did get it?

Like, if you just got to a job and someone that's been there for say a year got promoted, you wouldn't make a big deal of you not being promoted as well. Same concept, those people with those skins put in the effort and work, they have a reward you don't.

People should be able to get it by buying it. High elo players shouldn't be given a special reward just because they got to that rank. For all we know a lot of them could have payed others to boost them, so do they really deserve it? No.

Give the rest of the playerbase a chance to get them and give Golds another reward like RP or something. But that's my opinion, and I don't need you all attacking me for it. I didn't ask you to reply to my post, I was only wanting the Red too.

Welcome to League of Legends, where you will get addicted, spend hundreds of dollars that fuel our non existent care for you as we sit back and laugh while you rage! Ah, you're bronze. So it'd make sense that you complain about victorious skins especially. Seeing how you simply go to blame your team for your own mistakes, and refuse to improve. Again, with the limited availability skins, you could have possibly been active during the time. Also again, it is their way of rewarding players who are active. You chose not to be active by not playing the game at the time of those events. I'm not going to argue with you further if you're simply going to be ignorant. Not sure what I'd expect from a player who blames everyone else for their own mistakes though.

Excuse me?! I do not blame others for my mistakes. But of course you are just like all the typical high elo players that attack others for their low rank. Not all people in bronze are complete shit so stop attacking them.

I only joined last year. I might think that Riot's policies are complete crap but I don't blame others if I did something wrong in the game. 

I have played during the time the limited skins were available, but I still see how others who joined later could not get them since the time had passed and they have to wait until they come up for sale again, which can be months. So I feel for them in a way as from what I remember I missed some really good ones. 

As for the Victorious skins, that's my own opinion. I think the policy is complete bullshit. It still doesn't mean that I'm a bad player or I refuse to improve. If you actually looked at my stats you would see I got out of Bronze, then got stuck back in it during placements. Right now I just refuse to play ranked because of the awful balance the game is in.

And finally, don't ever attack someone for their rank again. It's disrespectful and mean. And if you try to attack me again, I will not reply to you. You will only get downvoted and reported.
